name: Gnomeland
description:
A tiny planet of gnomes is headed for catastrophe, but you can change the future. Will you save them or let them be destroyed? The tiniest decisions have the biggest effects in: Gnomeland. Right click to rotate view.  Hold left click to give a butterfly.

 A game created in 5 days for the 2018 Spring #ue4jam inspired by the theme "Transformation". Made with the Unreal 4 Engine.
